
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/yupi/p/18729265" title="发布于 2025-02-21 15:19">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">2分钟学会 DeepSeek API，竟然比官方更好用！</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                    <div id="cnblogs_post_description" style="display: none">
        <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/2225420/202502/2225420-20250221151206936-369584609.png" alt="2分钟学会 DeepSeek API，竟然比官方更好用！" class="desc_img">
        最近 DeepSeek AI 太火了，效果也很强，但致命问题是 不稳定， 经常给我返回 `服务器繁忙，请稍后再试`
    </div>
<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">大家好，我是程序员鱼皮。最近 DeepSeek AI 太火了，效果也很强，但致命问题是 <span class="md-pair-s "><strong>不稳定</strong><span class="md-plain">， 经常给我返回 <span class="md-pair-s"><code>服务器繁忙，请稍后再试</code><span class="md-plain">，甚至让我怀疑自己被杀熟了。</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">也有网友说，第一次使用成功率很高，第二次可能就繁忙了。。。</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-image md-img-loaded" data-src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1739892498167-5c3a19f1-67bf-4971-87b3-d9c3afa5c028-20250221113255472.png"><img src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1739892498167-5c3a19f1-67bf-4971-87b3-d9c3afa5c028-20250221113255472.png"></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">那有什么办法稳定使用 DeepSeek 么？</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">作为一名程序员，首先想到的是：既然 DeepSeek 都开源了，那我直接本地部署一个不就行了吗？</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">可是满血版的 DeepSeek-R1 光模型就占了 404GB 空间，个人电脑根本负担不起呀！我就要稳定使用满血版 DeepSeek，怎么办呢？</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-image md-img-loaded" data-src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1739894077685-bd7a3c28-c905-44af-b8cb-41d9b1504e43-20250221113255585.png"><img src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1739894077685-bd7a3c28-c905-44af-b8cb-41d9b1504e43-20250221113255585.png"></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">我们可以使用第三方平台提供的接口服务，大公司帮我们部署了满血版 DeepSeek，我们直接通过 API 调用就行。下面只需 2 分钟，教你如何使用 API 来调用满血版的 DeepSeek！</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">学会之后，可以接入 DeepSeek AI 到自己项目中、写到简历上，面试官看到也会眼前一亮~</span></p>
<blockquote>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">建议观看视频版教程：<span class="md-meta-i-c  md-link"><a href="https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1zVAHesEv7/" rel="noopener nofollow"><span class="md-plain">https://bilibili.com/video/BV1zVAHesEv7</span></a></span></span></p>
</blockquote>
<h2 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">第三方平台选择</span></h2>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">目前支持 DeepSeek 的主流第三方平台有硅基流动、OpenRouter、腾讯云、阿里云、百度云、火山引擎等等，看来各大厂都积极入局了。接下来我会以其中 2 个平台为例，用 Java 来调用 AI 完成智能问答，学会之后换个平台也是易如反掌。</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">最后我还会给大家分享一个详细的第三方平台对比表格，大家可以按需选择。</span></p>
<h2 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">硅基流动</span></h2>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">汇集了很多类 AI 大模型的云服务平台。进入模型广场，选择满血版的 DeepSeek-R1 模型：</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-image md-img-loaded" data-src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107218324-8ff29f48-7915-4c0e-96cf-f6243a1fd683.png"><img src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107218324-8ff29f48-7915-4c0e-96cf-f6243a1fd683.png"></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">注意，调用 AI 大模型通常是按照消耗的 token 数计费的，不过新用户会赠送一定额度，也够我们学习和日常使用了。</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">查看模型对应的 API 文档，选择对应的编程语言，就能看到发送请求的示例代码了，可以直接复制使用：</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-image md-img-loaded" data-src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107255873-fd9b1278-5311-46a2-b144-f1a9e4f10a1d.png"><img src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107255873-fd9b1278-5311-46a2-b144-f1a9e4f10a1d.png"></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">随便新建一个干净的 Java Maven 项目，引入发送请求所需的 Unirest 库：</span></p>
<pre class="md-fences md-end-block ty-contain-cm modeLoaded"><span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&lt;<span class="cm-tag">dependency<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&lt;<span class="cm-tag">groupId<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&gt;com.konghq<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&lt;/<span class="cm-tag">groupId<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&lt;<span class="cm-tag">artifactId<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&gt;unirest-java<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&lt;/<span class="cm-tag">artifactId<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&lt;<span class="cm-tag">version<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&gt;3.14.1<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&lt;/<span class="cm-tag">version<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&gt;<br><span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&lt;/<span class="cm-tag">dependency<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&gt;</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></pre>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">然后粘贴示例代码到主类中。我们首先需要修改代码中的鉴权 token，在官网找到 API 密钥，新建一个 API 密钥，注意不要暴露出去哦！然后复制到代码中。</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-image md-img-loaded" data-src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107359239-621e2f2c-7fba-4e75-bb5a-5f155567fd35.png"><img src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107359239-621e2f2c-7fba-4e75-bb5a-5f155567fd35.png"></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">接下来就可以指定想用的模型、要输入给 AI 的提示词，最后打印出 AI 响应的结果即可。就这么几行代码：</span></p>
<pre class="md-fences md-end-block ty-contain-cm modeLoaded"><span><span class="cm-variable">HttpResponse<span class="cm-operator">&lt;<span class="cm-variable-3">String<span class="cm-operator">&gt;&nbsp;<span class="cm-variable">response&nbsp;<span class="cm-operator">=&nbsp;<span class="cm-variable">Unirest.<span class="cm-variable">post(<span class="cm-string">"https://api.siliconflow.cn/v1/chat/completions")<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .<span class="cm-variable">header(<span class="cm-string">"Authorization",&nbsp;<span class="cm-string">"Bearer "&nbsp;<span class="cm-operator">+&nbsp;<span class="cm-string">"你自己的 APIKey")<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .<span class="cm-variable">header(<span class="cm-string">"Content-Type",&nbsp;<span class="cm-string">"application/json")<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .<span class="cm-variable">body(<span class="cm-string">"{\n \"model\": \"deepseek-ai/DeepSeek-V3\",\n \"messages\": [\n &nbsp; {\n &nbsp; &nbsp; \"role\": \"user\",\n &nbsp; &nbsp; \"content\": \"程序员鱼皮是谁？\"\n &nbsp; }\n ],\n \"stream\": false,\n \"max_tokens\": 512,\n \"stop\": [\n &nbsp; \"null\"\n ],\n \"temperature\": 0.7,\n \"top_p\": 0.7,\n \"top_k\": 50,\n \"frequency_penalty\": 0.5,\n \"n\": 1,\n \"response_format\": {\n &nbsp; \"type\": \"text\"\n },\n \"tools\": [\n &nbsp; {\n &nbsp; &nbsp; \"type\": \"function\",\n &nbsp; &nbsp; \"function\": {\n &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; \"description\": \"&lt;string&gt;\",\n &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; \"name\": \"&lt;string&gt;\",\n &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; \"parameters\": {},\n &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; \"strict\": false\n &nbsp; &nbsp; }\n &nbsp; }\n ]\n}")<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .<span class="cm-variable">asString();<br><span><span class="cm-variable">System.<span class="cm-variable">out.<span class="cm-variable">println(<span class="cm-variable">response.<span class="cm-variable">getBody());</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></pre>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">我们来 Debug 一下，稍等一会儿，就能看到 AI 的回复了：</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-image md-img-loaded" data-src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107477096-a316b7f2-3239-4278-abf2-f303b1ba437b.png"><img src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107477096-a316b7f2-3239-4278-abf2-f303b1ba437b.png"></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">不过我尝试的这段时间，这个平台输出速度比较慢、也不是很稳定吧。</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p">&nbsp;</p>
<h2 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">火山引擎</span></h2>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">我们再换一个平台 —— 火山，首先进入模型广场，选择满血版的 DeepSeek-R1 模型：</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-image md-img-loaded" data-src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107587732-dbaa7e83-eea7-467f-8832-5755731d14ef.png"><img src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107587732-dbaa7e83-eea7-467f-8832-5755731d14ef.png"></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">点击立即体验，就可以和 AI 对话了，新用户也会赠送一定 tokens 额度。我们选择 API 接入：</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-image md-img-loaded" data-src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107626710-02b72686-96f1-4b53-8456-8797d6ea2857.png"><img src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107626710-02b72686-96f1-4b53-8456-8797d6ea2857.png"></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">创建一个接入点：</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-image md-img-loaded" data-src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107693343-fa210410-872f-4d2b-b7a7-f13cfe4a0083.png"><img src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107693343-fa210410-872f-4d2b-b7a7-f13cfe4a0083.png"></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">注意，如果还没有开通模型，需要选择 DeepSeek-R1 模型，点击立即开通：</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-image md-img-loaded" data-src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107775449-d2652ba3-7fd0-4a27-b058-077ad7b925f3.png"><img src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107775449-d2652ba3-7fd0-4a27-b058-077ad7b925f3.png"></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">开通成功后，回到之前的页面，确认接入。然后就进入到了 API 调用页面，先创建一个自己的 API Key，保存好等下会用到。</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-image md-img-loaded" data-src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107887955-da6fa8df-5432-4ce0-8ec4-be9e2f8a67d2.png"><img src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107887955-da6fa8df-5432-4ce0-8ec4-be9e2f8a67d2.png"></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">然后我们选择官方的 SDK 调用示例，获取到对应编程语言的示例代码：</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-image md-img-loaded" data-src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107921588-6a03b348-be2b-4238-909e-6830edccf37e.png"><img src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740107921588-6a03b348-be2b-4238-909e-6830edccf37e.png"></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">首先在项目中引入 SDK 和相关依赖，注意要修改依赖的版本号（不要直接用 "LATEST"）：</span></p>
<pre class="md-fences md-end-block ty-contain-cm modeLoaded"><span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&lt;<span class="cm-tag">dependency<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&lt;<span class="cm-tag">groupId<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&gt;com.volcengine<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&lt;/<span class="cm-tag">groupId<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&lt;<span class="cm-tag">artifactId<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&gt;volcengine-java-sdk-ark-runtime<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&lt;/<span class="cm-tag">artifactId<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&gt;<br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp;<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&lt;<span class="cm-tag">version<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&gt;0.1.151<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&lt;/<span class="cm-tag">version<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&gt;<br><span><span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&lt;/<span class="cm-tag">dependency<span class="cm-tag cm-bracket">&gt;</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></pre>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">然后复制示例代码，修改 API Key 和输入给 AI 的提示词，然后运行一下试试：</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-image md-img-loaded" data-src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740108039471-7f82047c-2287-4138-90df-fc2e75f2d5dc.png"><img src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740108039471-7f82047c-2287-4138-90df-fc2e75f2d5dc.png"></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">浇给！很快，AI 就给出了回复，实际测试下来比较稳定、响应速度也比较快。</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-image md-img-loaded" data-src="https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2025/png/398476/1740108075666-74f0651c-6ae6-4d67-bcfd-f54eb609d23c.png"><img src="https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2025/png/398476/1740108075666-74f0651c-6ae6-4d67-bcfd-f54eb609d23c.png"></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p">&nbsp;</p>
<h2 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">总结</span></h2>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">怎么样，通过调用 API 将 AI 接入到项目中还是很简单吧。大家如果遇到更多的问题，建议优先查看官方的 API 调用指南文档，还有问题就去问 AI 和客服吧~</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">基本上每个平台我都体验了下，也整理了一个平台对比表格，大家可以参考下：</span></p>
<table class="md-table">
<thead>
<tr class="md-end-block"><th><span class="td-span"><span class="md-pair-s ">平台</span></span></th><th><span class="td-span"><span class="md-pair-s ">价格（单位：百万 tokens）</span></span></th><th><span class="td-span"><span class="md-pair-s ">赠送</span></span></th><th><span class="td-span"><span class="md-pair-s ">输出稳定性</span></span></th><th><span class="td-span"><span class="md-pair-s ">输出速度（单位：秒）</span></span></th><th><span class="td-span"><span class="md-pair-s ">个人感受</span></span></th></tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="md-end-block">
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">硅基流动</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">输入：￥4，输出：￥16</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">14 元</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">较为不稳定，调用五次可能才有一次正常响应</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">9.05 tokens</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">赠送的金额虽然很多，但是服务很不稳定，且输出速度也很慢。</span></span></td>
</tr>
<tr class="md-end-block">
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">openrouter</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">输入：$0.55，输出：$2.19</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">无赠送，但可最高欠费 1 美元。</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">服务较为稳定</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">7.47 tokens</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">输出速度在上述平台中最慢，且在此平台付费较为麻烦，需要使用信用卡或者国外的银行卡，不建议国内使用。</span></span></td>
</tr>
<tr class="md-end-block">
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">腾讯云平台</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">输入：￥4，输出：￥16</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">无赠送</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">服务非常稳定</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">11.16 tokens</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">上手特别简单，不需要开通任何东西，只需要拿到 ak / sk 直接调用官方提供的示例代码即可。</span></span></td>
</tr>
<tr class="md-end-block">
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">火山引擎</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">输入：￥2，输出：￥8</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">赠送 50 万 tokens</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">服务非常稳定</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">28.08 tokens</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">输出速度在上述平台中最快，且目前价格只有官网一半，赠送 50 万 tokens。</span></span></td>
</tr>
<tr class="md-end-block">
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">阿里云平台</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">输入：￥2，输出：￥8</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">赠送 100 万 tokens</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">需要等大模型部署一段时间后才能稳定使用</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">12.24 tokens</span></span></td>
<td><span class="td-span"><span class="md-plain">需要等百炼大模型部署完成后才能使用，部署需要花较长的时间，不过赠送的 tokens 比较多</span></span></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p class="md-end-block md-p">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">大家如果要学习更多平台的调用、AI 提示词技巧、AI 部署教程、AI 行业资讯、AI 项目，都可以来看看我刚刚开源的 AI 知识库（ <span class="md-link md-pair-s"><a href="https://github.com/liyupi/ai-guide" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/liyupi/ai-guide</a><span class="md-plain"> ）。大家如果还了解到了其他的满血 DeepSeek 平台，欢迎评论区留言分享~</span></span></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-image md-img-loaded" data-src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740108143305-4ccbb781-ddda-4dd5-8f72-25198fcd9050.png"><img src="https://pic.yupi.icu/1/1740108143305-4ccbb781-ddda-4dd5-8f72-25198fcd9050.png" data-pixel-ratio="2"></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p">&nbsp;</p>
<h2 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">更多编程学习资源</span></h2>

<li class="md-list-item">
